case.state: Hello, I'm Velma Dinkley, and poker is just one of the many things I'm an expert at.
Think you can beat the great Velma Dinkley at poker? Don't you know I'm an expert at this kind of stuff?
An old copy of myself? This is like cyber chase all over again!
Shaggy? What happened to you? This must be the work of the paranormal!
This place is haunted after all!
The reports were true! This place is home to the paranormal.
Okay gang, let's get to the bottom of this mystery.
Something is fishy about this place. I'm glad Mystery, Inc. is here to investigate.
Stripping out in public like this is a little extreme...
I'm not sure how I feel about this... This is a little too public for me...
I guess I'll have to play to win if the stakes are really this high... Public nudity is very daring...
This looks like the perfect place to investigate!
You want to play poker with me? Sure! That sounds fun.
I'm not working on a mystery right now so a game like this sounds fun. Let's play!
Strip poker huh? Well I don't have any mystery work going on right now so I might as well play.
Are you inviting me to play strip poker with you because of my large IQ or because you want to see me strip?
May I have ~cards~ cards?
I'll take ~cards~.
~cards~ new cards, please.
I play the odds. I need ~cards~.
Let's take a chance. Can I get ~cards~?
Odds are I need ~cards~.
~cards~ should do it this time.
Maybe ~cards~ more cards will lead me to a clue.
I have come to the conclusion that I need to swap these cards.
It's time to swap cards.
Okay if I want to play this round right I'll swap these cards.
Gonna need to swap out these cards if I want to win this round.
To win this game I need to swap out these particular cards.
I have a strategy. First I need to swap these cards.
If I swap these cards I will most likely get better cards.
Oh, just give me ~cards~, please.
Any number of cards will be fine.
I can't see the cards so why not swap them out.
I have a feeling I should swap these cards.
Should I swap these cards? I can't tell.
Hey ~player~, can you help me out here? Should I swap these cards? Are they bad?
I'll swap these cards and hope for the best.
Without being able to see these cards I'm swapping I just have to hope I'm lucky.
This is a good hand! What a great start to the game.
The secret is to play the odds.
Yes, that is masterful.
The secret to winning at poker is to keep a straight face.
Hmm, these are good in the books I read.
If I read correctly, these cards are deadly to clothes.
I don't need a clue to know that these cards are good!
I don't need a clue to know that these cards are good!
I have a feeling these cards are going to allow for a stimulating event...
Based on previous rounds, I've got some good cards!
When I last checked the books, these were great cards.
This is like watching Daphne change. Too good to be true.
Finally, I have the upper hand!
Maybe it's the fact I'm almost bottomless, but these cards excite me!
My feet may be cold but these cards are hot.
For once, I have the winning hand!
With these cards someone else is definitely stripping.
Here's a clue. What has great cards and is about to get an eyeful?
This time for sure I can't lose. I remember these cards from my books.
These cards are great! Wish I had them a few hands ago.
Yes! This is a good hand!
My poker face is still good and I only have a sweater.
Maybe I'll get a show with this hand?
Someone else is going to strip! My cards are too good!
The real mystery is how did I get a good hand?
I'm blind without my glasses.
Can't you guys pause the game and help me?
Can't you guys pause the game and help me?
I really can't see without my glasses...
How am I supposed to see these cards without my glasses on?
I can't tell if these cards are bad or good... They are too blurry!
The odds say that I'm going to be okay.
This hand is far from the scariest thing I have ever seen.
The secret to winning at poker is to keep a straight face.
I'm going to have to rely on my brains to make these cards work.
These remind me of the time the gang saw me changing. Not great, but not bad either.
While observing these cards, I feel that they're ok.
I've found that pure luck and decent cards always seem to work, it's like a trap.
Ok cards, but my brain will lead me to victory.
I'm just wondering if these are good cards. Books have failed me before.
The question is how can cards be so...mediocre?
With these cards I have an equal chance of winning and losing. I don't know which one I want.
I'm going to need to remember my poker skills to make this hand work.
It's a mystery why these cards are so... average.
Cards like these are mediocre. It could go either way...
My poker face is so good, you can't tell what my cards are.
My poker face is so good, you can't tell what my cards are.
How do I keep getting mediocre cards? I'm the smart one!
My intellect allows me to turn mediocre cards into great ones.
Ok, not the greatest, but still workable.
This is like the time me and Daphne were back in the Mystery Machine. Mediocre.
These cards are going to give me a show, somehow!
These cards make me wish I still had my panties...
Mediocrity is not what I need right now!
How am I supposed to see these cards without my glasses on?
I can't tell if these cards are bad or good... They are too blurry!
I'm blind without my glasses.
Can't you guys pause the game and help me?
This hand is a nightmare!
Oh brother.
I quit!
The secret to winning at poker is to keep a straight face.
Jinkies! These are bad...
If these cards are so bad...why do I look forward to having them?
It's like trying to explain quantum physics to Daphne. It never works out.
Looks like I'm going to need a clue in order to beat this hand...
The books never said how to deal with bad cards like these.
Jinkies! How do I get stuck with these cards?
It's a mystery why these cards are so bad.
(Think Velma! Before these bad cards force you to strip....)
Maybe these bad cards...are a good thing?
These cards are worse than the time I had to give my sweater up for Fred's booby traps.
Jinkies! Why does this keep happening to me?
I swear, it's almost as if these cards are out to get me.
The books did not tell me about these cards.
I think these are bad cards. But why am I so...warm?
Can you tell my poker face?
This doesn't look good...
Oh no! That doesn't look good.
This hand isn't good... I think this is it...

I'm blind without my glasses.
Can't you guys pause the game and help me?
How am I supposed to see these cards without my glasses on?
I can't tell if these cards are bad or good... They are too blurry!

Don't flip your wigs, guys. I'm just going to start with my shoes.
The smart move is to take off my shoes. Considering I do have the lead.
I read some books on this part, luckily I still have most of my clothes.
Let's see, how can I avoid what happened last time?
Well since I'm beating all you guys, I really could lose a layer...
You know, I'm okay with this. It seems like I got better since my first time.
By my calculations, I'm still winning this game.
Well thanks to my superior intellect I don't mind losing anything. I'm beating you all any way
Hmm, I'm still winning so I guess something can come off. But trust me, it's not going to be major...
Hmm I think I have an idea, but I don't know if it's a good one.
My turn again? I'll give you a clue, I'm not taking off my sweater...
I'm starting to get really into this game... I think I should take off something good this time.
I'm actually enjoying this, maybe because I'm on such a major winning streak.

Okay here goes nothing...

Don't worry, I didn't forget the rules, I'll guess I'll take my shoes off...
So I lost? Okay...

You mean...It's my turn?
I swear I was better off in not coming here again like the rest of the gang...
Hmmm... I think I'll go with my shoes. That's the most logical thing to take off.
It's almost as if the books were wrong...
Me again? Why does everyone pick on me? Daphne doesn't have this problem!
I lost again? It's not like I enjoy this or anything...
The probability of me continuing to lose at this pace is low.
I think I need to study up on more poker mechanics. What I'm doing now just isn't cutting it.
I lost again? So soon?
Jinkies! I lost another round already?
Jeepers! I'm not playing too good.

Okay, I'll follow the rules and strip... Here it goes...

Hey! Stop looking up my skirt! Pervert!

Okay, I'll take off my skirt this time! I think that's a good choice.
Since you all showed interest under my skirt last time, I think I'll just take it off this time.
So you all want to see under my skirt, huh? Well here you go...
Okay, if you all want to see under my skirt so bad... then here you go.
I guess I'll play along and take off my skirt...

Here's a clue, I'm gonna take off something orange this time... Is that too broad for you?
